text: is a Polish retail bank we provide
banking services for our customers in
thousands of postal offices and from
Modern digital channels Mobile Banking
and mobile payments are among our most
intensively developed Services the
security of our customers money and data
is our top priority we are testing our
Electronic Banking application in the
cloud migrating our electronic banking
system to the cloud will be our next
step risk analysis must precede
migration to the cloud it cannot be done
without a close collaboration between
the customer and the cloud provider
tanishq's AWS Advanced partner who
specialize in Cloud migrations for large
Enterprises we specifically focus on FSI
migrations we have developed a number of
products that help to perform such
migrations including compliance
framework that specifically addresses
our clients needs we have helped the
bank watch server to perform the
analysis of the regulatory requirement
and based on the output of our work we
have created additional controls for the
AWS config and conformance packs that
ensure those regulatory requirements are
followed and proper mitigation actions
are in place AWS config continually
assesses Audits and evaluates the
configurations and relationships of your
resources it receives updates from your
entire infrastructure tamashi introduced
a concept of continuous compliance that
helps the bank to see which elements of
cloud infrastructure are in compliance
with the regulatory requirements it's
not only about performing a one-time
audit of the bank infrastructure it's
about performing a continuous checks of
all the regulatory requirements all the
AWS best practices and security best
practices this also allows to shorten
amount of time it takes for the new
developers to learn about the best
practices and the rules which are being
followed by the bank AWS conformance
packs make it easier to ensure
compliance in the longer term when your
features are added or the key solution
configuration is changed we are able to
ensure selected parameters are still in
line with our policies changes can be
applied in the controlled Manner and
both compliance and security risks are
reduced Cloud brings new opportunities
for Bank First over with security and
compliance challenges addressed it will
allow us to enhance our customers
experience and deliver new capabilities
faster
